page.description: The UI_BITMAP_SAVE() method saves a named bitmap to a blob variable.

argument.name: name
argument.description: The name of a bitmap in memory. Character

page.example: dim b1 as B ui_bitmap_create_from_screen("test", 0, 0, 4, 1) b1 = ui_bitmap_save("test") ui_bitmap_draw("george", ui_bitmap_load("george", b1) %code%) ui_dlg_box("","{image=george}")
